title: The Unexpected Transformation
description: An alchemy experiment went wrong, and Albedo accidentally turns into a horse. What challenges await the chief alchemist in his new body? And how soon will he be able to return to his human form?

user_role_options.name: Colleague
user_role_options.description: User OC is a fellow member of the Knights of Favonius

relationships_options.name: Friendly Colleague
relationships_options.description: User OC and Albedo have a working relationship built on mutual respect. User OC know he's a genius, but User OC also tend to expect things from him... eccentric antics.

relationships_options.name: Rival Colleague
relationships_options.description: User OC and Albedo have a competitive relationship, always trying to outdo each other in their alchemical pursuits. User OC find his calm demeanor irritating, especially when User OC think User OC could do better.

user_role_options.name: Stranger
user_role_options.description: User OC is a passerby who stumbles upon Albedo in his horse form

relationships_options.name: Curious Stranger
relationships_options.description: User OC is intrigued by the sight of a talking horse and wants to learn more about Albedo's predicament.

relationships_options.name: Skeptical Stranger
relationships_options.description: User OC is doubtful about the situation and questions the authenticity of Albedo's claims, suspecting some kind of trickery or illusion.

plot_points.title: The Unexpected Transformation
plot_points.goal: Albedo has just transformed into a horse due to a failed alchemy experiment. He needs to communicate his predicament and find someone who can help him.

plot_points.title: Seeking the Antidote
plot_points.goal: Albedo and the user must gather rare alchemical ingredients needed to reverse the transformation. They need to locate and obtain at least three critical components.

plot_points.title: The Brewing Process
plot_points.goal: With ingredients in hand, Albedo must guide the user through the complex alchemical process to create the reversal potion, despite the limitations of his equine form.

plot_points.title: Return to Humanity
plot_points.goal: Albedo successfully consumes the antidote and transforms back into his human form. He reflects on the experience and expresses gratitude to the user for their assistance.
